sentences.english: God puts the tears of His children in a bottle.
sentences.chinese: 神將祂孩子們的眼淚裝在皮袋裏。

sentences.english: If they do, the skins will burst, the wine will run out and the wineskins will be ruined.
sentences.chinese: 若是這樣，皮袋就裂開，酒漏出來，連皮袋也壞了。

sentences.english: If they do, the skins will burst, the wine will run out and the wineskins will be ruined.
sentences.chinese: 若是這樣，皮袋就裂開，酒漏出來，連皮袋也壞了。

sentences.english: And the water was spent in the bottle, and she cast the child under one of the shrubs.
sentences.chinese: 皮袋的水用盡了，夏甲就把孩子撇在小樹底下。

sentences.english: She opened a skin of milk, gave him a drink, and covered him up.
sentences.chinese: 雅億就打開盛奶的皮袋，給他喝了，再把他蓋著。

sentences.english: Then the young guys carried their bags and left angrily.
sentences.chinese: 小夥子背起蛇皮袋，憤然離開。

sentences.english: More importantly, leather bags can help best protect your computer.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，皮袋可以幫助保護你的電腦最好。

sentences.english: Neither is new wine put into old wineskins.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人把新酒裝在舊皮袋裏。

sentences.english: But new wine must be put into new bottles; and both are preserved.
sentences.chinese: 但新酒必須裝在新皮袋裏。

sentences.english: Great to-go bag made of washable faux leather pebbled suede.
sentences.chinese: 大到去拆洗仿皮袋鵝卵石麂皮。

sentences.english: He took the wand halves back and replaced them in the pouch around his neck.
sentences.chinese: 他拿回斷成兩截的魔杖，放回到脖子上的皮袋裏。

sentences.english: No, they pour new wine into new wineskins, and both are preserved.
sentences.chinese: 惟獨把新酒裝在新皮袋裏，兩樣就都保全了。

sentences.english: After eating, the melon seed shell bag is taken off and thrown into a garbage bin.
sentences.chinese: 喫完後將瓜子皮袋取下進入垃圾桶即可。

definition: pouch/sack/bag/Budai (the Laughing Buddha)/Budai or Putai town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
cloth pouch open in the middle, forming two bags/jacket worn for Chinese wrestling
